name: Nokia 208
snippet: WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and Nimbuzz come preloaded, so you can get right to chatting, posting and commenting. Or share pictures and videos straight to your friend's phone using Slam.

The Nokia 208 is a practical choice for a second phone: it works with a micro-SIM, so you can use the same SIM card as for your smartphone. And you can transfer contacts between phones easily with the free sync app.
description: WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and Nimbuzz come preloaded, so you can get right to chatting, posting and commenting. Or share pictures and videos straight to your friend's phone using Slam.

Getting great shots on the 208 is easy. Follow the in-built voice guidance to capture the best self-portrait. Or get more in the picture with the incredible 100-degree panorama. And once you're done, share your photos straight from the gallery to your social networks.

The Nokia 208 is a practical choice for a second phone: it works with a micro-SIM, so you can use the same SIM card as for your smartphone. And you can transfer contacts between phones easily with the free sync app.

name: Samsung S5511T
snippet: The Samsung S5511T features a 3.2MP camera, 2.2' TFT screen, 120MB memory, up to 240 minutes of talk time and up to 300 hours standby time. All the essentials to make communication with friends and family easy!
description: The Samsung S5511T features a 3.2MP camera, 2.2' TFT screen, 120MB memory, up to 240 minutes of talk time and up to 300 hours standby time. All the essentials to make communication with friends and family easy!

name: Telstra Pulse
snippet: Stand out from the crowd with this fun, touch screen phone. Stylish design with a 3.5' colour touch screen, that fits easily in your pocket. The Telstra Pulse™ is jam packed with features. It has a 2MP camera to capture your favourite moments, Bluetooth, WiFi, MP3 player and an integrated FM radio so you can listen to the latest hits and a whole lot more.
description: Stand out from the crowd with this fun, touch screen phone. Stylish design with a 3.5' colour touch screen, that fits easily in your pocket. The Telstra Pulse™ is jam packed with features. It has a 2MP camera to capture your favourite moments, Bluetooth, WiFi, MP3 player and an integrated FM radio so you can listen to the latest hits and a whole lot more

name: LG Optimus L3II
snippet: Active Dual-SIM feature gives you the option to keep two numbers active at the same time on the single handset. Simply use the hot key function to seamlessly switch between SIM cards. Manage your costs – by maximising the benefits of different calling rates. Keep connected while travelling overseas by putting in a SIM at your destination or simply manage work and private calls on two numbers on the one handset.
description: Active Dual-SIM feature gives you the option to keep two numbers active at the same time on the single handset. Simply use the hot key function to seamlessly switch between SIM cards. Manage your costs – by maximising the benefits of different calling rates. Keep connected while travelling overseas by putting in a SIM at your destination or simply manage work and private calls on two numbers on the one handset.
The rounded contours and clean lines are more than just easy on the eyes as they come together to create a form that fits nicely in your palm and is a dream to hold.
Get noticed with a rear design that gleams brilliantly as it grabs attention with its shimmering textured finish.
Discover aesthetics you don't know could exist on a phone with the laser-etched detailing that makes it look even slimmer than it actually is.
Find balance with a quick switch between SIM 1 and SIM 2 using the dedicated hot key. Now switching between two lives is as easy as pushing a button

name: Huawei Ascend
snippet: The Huawei Ascend Y300 smartphone is powered by a 1 GHz dual-core processor that lets you multitask with ease.  Experience rich mobile web browsing with Android™ Jellybean 4.1 while capturing your favorite moments with a 5MP auto-focus camera.“Telstra blue-tick approved for the regional area use on the Telstra network.
description: The Huawei Ascend Y300 smartphone is powered by a 1 GHz dual-core processor that lets you multitask with ease.  Experience rich mobile web browsing with Android™ Jellybean 4.1 while capturing your favorite moments with a 5MP auto-focus camera.“Telstra blue-tick approved for the regional area use on the Telstra network.

name: Samsung Galaxy Y
snippet: GALAXY DUOS is for young and practical consumers who want to manage their professional career and busy social life with affordable price. Beyond the flexibility of its dual SIM card system, GALAXY DUOS is a beautifully designed smartphone contained in a polished metallic casing. Its ergonomic design is complemented by a 3.14' full touch display that provides optimal legibility for a smartphone of its size.
description: GALAXY DUOS is for young and practical consumers who want to manage their professional career and busy social life with affordable price. Beyond the flexibility of its dual SIM card system, GALAXY DUOS is a beautifully designed smartphone contained in a polished metallic casing. Its ergonomic design is complemented by a 3.14' full touch display that provides optimal legibility for a smartphone of its size.
Powered by Android 2.3 and running on a powerful 832MHz processor, GALAXY DUOS offers advanced performance and versatility needed to successfully manage busy professional and social lifestyles.

name: Telstra 4G
snippet: The wait is over! Telstra's first 4G pre-paid device will let you download faster and upload quicker when in 4G coverage areas. What's more, if you're outside 4G coverage areas, the Telstra Frontier 4G switches to our superfast Next G® network, which is the fastest 3G national mobile network in the country all wrapped up in a stylish and slim, compact design with a 4' capacitive touch screen.
description: The wait is over! Telstra's first 4G pre-paid device will let you download faster and upload quicker when in 4G coverage areas. What's more, if you're outside 4G coverage areas, the Telstra Frontier 4G switches to our superfast Next G® network, which is the fastest 3G national mobile network in the country all wrapped up in a stylish and slim, compact design with a 4' capacitive touch screen.
Powered by Android - provides a rich mobile web browsing experience on your Smartphone, as well as access to Google services such as Google Search, Gmail, Google Maps, Calendar and YouTube.

Multimedia on go - Capture your favourite moments with a 5 mega-pixel camera. Listen to your music with an integrated MP3 player and store these on a MicroSD card (not included) which can be expanded to support up to 32GB.

name: Nokia Lumia 520
snippet: Powered by Windows Phone 8, the Nokia Lumia 520 comes with exclusive digital lenses, a 1GHz dual core processor, and a touchscreen that even works with long finger nails or gloves.

The 4-inch touchscreen on the Nokia Lumia 520 is so sensitive that you can even use it when wearing gloves or with your fingernails. So typing, chatting and surfing are easier and more convenient than ever.
description: Powered by Windows Phone 8, the Nokia Lumia 520 comes with exclusive digital lenses, a 1GHz dual core processor, and a touchscreen that even works with long finger nails or gloves.

Once you’ve tried Live Tiles, you won’t know what you did without them. Live Tiles constantly update in real time on your start screen, to show you what’s new and what’s now. And you can personalise the content that matters to you by resizing the tiles. Windows Phone 8 also gives you 7GB of storage on Microsoft SkyDrive, so you can sync your phone and computer. And you can make your office mobile with pre-installed Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint.

The Nokia Lumia 520 comes with digital lenses built in - exclusive to Nokia and guaranteed to wow your friends. Add motion to your images with Cinemagraph. Take multiple photos with a single click using Smart Shoot, so you can edit effortlessly to make the perfect shot. And with Panorama, you can get the whole picture.

The 4-inch touchscreen on the Nokia Lumia 520 is so sensitive that you can even use it when wearing gloves or with your fingernails. So typing, chatting and surfing are easier and more convenient than ever.

Nokia Mix Radio fills every moment of your day with free music. You can choose from over 150 mixes by experts, or generate your own playlists with the artists you love. Best of all, you can take your favourite mixes offline and listen when you’re not connected to a network. Share your favourite tracks with friends by posting links straight to your social networks, or by sending them in an email or via SMS. (Streaming or downloading music over your mobile data connection may involve the transfer of large amounts of data, so please check with your provider.)

name: Samsung Galaxy Ace
snippet: Combining fast performance with a modern appeal, the Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus features an immersive touch screen and 1GHz processor which helps to handle your mobile operations with speed and ease.
description: Combining fast performance with a modern appeal, the Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus features an immersive touch screen and 1GHz processor which helps to handle your mobile operations with speed and ease.
The GALAXY Ace Plus incorporates sophisticated shimmering accents, refined edges. The extra large display ensures that the phone looks good on its own and even better while you are using it.

With NAVIGON's turn-by-turn navigation, the Samsung GALAXY Ace Plus transforms into a premium navigation device. Using preloaded AU and NZ maps, and FREE map updates every 3 months (data download charges may apply) are included. NAVIGON delivers 2D and 3D map views.
Access Google Play featuring a diverse range of the latest applications such as social networking, navigation, lifestyle, games and so much more.

name: HTC Desire
snippet: Advanced yet affordable, the HTC Desire 300 offers the latest smartphone features to keep you up to date without going over budget. Vibrant display with an always-refreshing home screen, HTC Music Channel, and snappy browsing speeds.
description: Advanced yet affordable, the HTC Desire 300 offers the latest smartphone features to keep you up to date without going over budget. Vibrant display with an always-refreshing home screen, HTC Music Channel, and snappy browsing speeds.
Automatically updating home screen refreshes every time you turn it on. Read the latest blogs, social network posts, sports scores, breaking news and more. Every time you look
Detailed visuals, bright colors, and full lamination for breathtaking videos and photos.
4.3' full lamination display screen features saturated colors, rich visuals, and detailed graphics for a smartphone experience that will enhance your web browsing and video playback.

name: LG Optimus F3
snippet: The LG Optimus F3 is small -- really small. Measuring just 4.57 inches tall, 2.44 inches wide, and 0.4 inch thick, the device is compact and can easily fit in front jeans pockets. Comfortable to operate with one hand, it's also lightweight at just 4 ounces.
description: The LG Optimus F3 is small -- really small. Measuring just 4.57 inches tall, 2.44 inches wide, and 0.4 inch thick, the device is compact and can easily fit in front jeans pockets. Comfortable to operate with one hand, it's also lightweight at just 4 ounces.

The handset ships with Android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean and comes with a number of Google's services, like Chrome, Gmail, Plus, Latitude, Local, Maps with Navigation, Messenger, Search, Shopper, Talk, and YouTube. The Google Play stores for Books, Magazines, Movies & TV, and Music are included as well.

name: iPhone 4s
snippet: iPhone 4s has a 3.5-inch Retina display, an 8-megapixel iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording, a FaceTime camera and a long battery life. And with iOS 7 and iCloud, it does more than ever.
description: iPhone 4s has a 3.5-inch Retina display, an 8-megapixel iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording, a FaceTime camera and a long battery life. And with iOS 7 and iCloud, it does more than ever.

Your very own personal assistant - “Siri” can understand natural language because she knows what you say, and what you mean. You can ask Siri “Remind me to call mum when I get home” or “Do I need anumbrella?” to get a weather report. You can make phone calls, send messages, schedules meetings, set reminders and more. How much more? Just ask, and Siri tells you that too.

Two cores in the A5 chip deliver up to two times more power and up to seven times faster graphics than the iPhone 4. And you’ll feel the effects. Fast. iPhone 4S is quick and responsive when you’relaunching apps, browsing the mobile web and playing games. No matter what you’re doing, you can keep on doing it. The iPhone 4S has an outstanding battery life when compared with iPhone 4. because the A5chip is so power-efficient.

A brilliant camera on a phone. And with all-new optics and an new 8 mega-pixel sensor, it just might be the only camera you need. Behind every shot, you’ve got 8 mega-pixel resolution and a custom lens with alarger f⁄2.4 aperture for great performance in low light. Plus, with an improved backside illuminated sensor, excellent auto white balance, advanced colour accuracy, face detection and reduced motion blur, nomatter how many people, how much light and how much action you capture, everything looks just as it should.
